text:
Tuesday 07th July 2015 You've done the work - now get the benefits - showcase your green tourism globally 
Sponsored Green News lets you tell your story to our massive, powerful, big spending, green-leaning, travel trade audience Are you a tourism destination or a tour operator, hotel or tourism attraction? Have you got a green tourism offer you want to market? Walking, cycling, soft or hard adventure holidays? Local food oriented? Culture, history, nature holidays? Trips by train or bus? Soft mobility destination? Green MICE, Green hotel? Green exhibition centre?Have you a green destination story you'd like to tell to attract just the right sort of tourists?Would you care to partner with the global green travel industry and its key community and get lots of good quality tourists?Green tourism is the tourism market of the future, more and more big names of the global industry are moving in a sustainable direction. More and more of the quality markets are demanding wall-to-wall green tourism.If your operation, destination, tourism attraction, accommodation or transport has a green story to tell…NOW is a good time to tell it.Get together with TravelMole - we are the world's most respected B2B marketplace 400,000 subscribers and over 2.5million travel trade unique users a month.And we publish the world's biggest B2B green & sustainable tourism news medium - VISION on Sustainable TourismThis is an enormously potent green partnership to bring trade business to your door - to fill your rooms, your destination, your vehicles, your ships and flights with top quality green tourists.Your green messages will be exposed to millions of potential visitors through the VISION on Sustainable Tourism weekly newswire audience of travel agents, tour operators, MICE organizers, airlines, coach, train and shipping companies.VISION on Sustainable Tourism has an impeccable and long-term record as the trade's window on the sustainable tourism world and the Vision medium is where your message will be read, and passed on, in blogs, on twitter, in emails…In the green world, it counts who your friends are and where you are seen - your medium really is a very major part of your message.With over 30,000 subscribers, the newswire has heavy-duty penetration See it HERE : Plus a massive social media footprint.Moreover all stories in Vision on Sustainable Tourism get even more long-lasting life as news items in the TravelMole.com green section.And TravelMole is simply the travel industry's most powerful and respected, global medium - with over 400,000 travel industry subscribers around the world and over 2.5 million unique users every month - so you will cover every single market base with your offer.We'd like you to be able to find out just how powerful this new medium is so at the moment we are offering very affordable tailor-made deals on sponsored news -Why not find out more? Just email ValereTjolle@TravelMole.com
